verses.roman:
teṅho āpanāke karena dāsa-bhāvanā
kṛṣṇa-dāsa-bhāva vinu āche kona janā

synonyms: teṅho—He also; āpanāke—Himself; karena—does; dāsa-bhāvanā—considering a servant; kṛṣṇa-dāsa-bhāva—the conception of being a servant of Kṛṣṇa; vinu—without; āche—is; kona—what; janā—person.
translation: He also considers Himself a servant of Lord Kṛṣṇa. Indeed, who is there who does not have this conception of being a servant of Lord Kṛṣṇa?
